block_comment: This block of code generates a fixed address depending on the data width (DWIDTH) and the command pattern (CMD_PATTERN). The address generation is implemented using conditional assignments in Verilog. For "CGEN_FIXED" or "CGEN_ALL" command patterns, the fixed address is created by concatenating a part of the input address with zeroes. The number of zeroes and the part of the input address used depends on the value of DWIDTH; larger values would append more zeros.
